    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vaporous Pipe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2198)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This hand-polished pipe is carved from oak and releases small wisps of smoke even when unlit. As long as you're holding a _vaporous pipe_, you don't take a circumstance penalty to Perception checks due to thick smoke, and you can't [suffocate](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) from smoke and heated air (such as within a [wildfire](/Rules.aspx?ID=664)). As long as you are holding the pipe, you also gain resistance to fire equal to half your level.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You draw on the pipe and then blow a massive cloud of smoke that fills a 30-foot emanation that includes your space. All creatures within the smoke cloud are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from each other and from creatures outside the smoke, though you can still see clearly within it. The smoke dissipates after 3 rounds, or after 1 round if subjected to a strong wind.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
